mapper.select: select a.nickname, b.truck_code,b.email, b.review_regdate ,b.review_score,b.review_content,b.review_reply_content,b.review_reply_regdate, b.review_code from review b , customer a where truck_code = #{truck_code} and a.email = b.email order by review_regdate DESC

select a.brandname,a.truck_code , b.review_code, b.review_content, b.review_score, TO_CHAR(b.review_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') review_regdate from review b , foodtruck a where a.truck_code = b.truck_code and b.email = #{email} order by b.review_regdate DESC
mapper.update: update review set review_content=#{review_content} where review_code=#{review_code ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select event_code , event_start, event_end , event_name , event_content , event_url from event where truck_code = #{truck_code}

with test_a as( select a.truck_code, b.truck_url, b.brandname, sum(a.review_score) score from review a , foodtruck b where a.review_regdate < trunc(sysdate,'mm') and a.review_regdate > trunc(add_months(sysdate, -1),'mm') and a.truck_code = b.truck_code GROUP BY a.truck_code, b.truck_url, b.brandname), test_b as( select c.* from (select rownum as rnum,row_number() over (order by test_a.score desc) as rank, test_a.* from test_a) c where c.rank <= 5) select * from test_b
mapper.update: update foodtruck set truck_url=#{truck_url}, truck_surl=#{truck_surl} where truck_code = #{truck_code}
mapper.select: select brandname from foodtruck where truck_code=#{truck_code}
